name: tm82
effect: Teaches Sleep Talk to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Dragon Tail to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Sleep Talk)

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
While it is asleep, the user
randomly uses one of the moves
it knows.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
While it is asleep, the user
randomly uses one of the moves
it knows.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
While it is asleep, the user
randomly uses one of the moves
it knows.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
The user knocks away the target and
drags out another Pokémon in its party.
In the wild, the battle ends.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
The user knocks away the target and
drags out another Pokémon in its party.
In the wild, the battle ends.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
The target is knocked away, and a different
Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this
ends a battle against a single Pokémon.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
The target is knocked away, and a different
Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends
a battle against a single Pokémon.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The target is knocked away, and a different
Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends
a battle against a single Pokémon.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The target is knocked away, and a different
Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends
a battle against a single Pokémon.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The user attacks and captures opposing Pokémon
using an electric net. This lowers their Speed stats.
